item.title: Markdown is really EASY...right ?
item.description: Markdown Cheatsheet =================== Heading 1 Markup : # Heading 1 # -OR- Markup : ============= (below H1 text) Heading 2 Markup : ## Heading 2 ## -OR- Markup: --------------- (below H2 text) Heading 3 Markup : ### Heading 3 ### Heading 4 Markup : #### Heading 4 #### Common text Markup : Common text Emphasized text Markup : _Emphasized text_ or *Emphasized text* Strikethrough text Markup : ~~Strikethrough text~~ Strong text
